lead_paragraph: Sam Allardyce was sacked as England manager on Tuesday having behaved "inappropriately" when seeking a lucrative sideline role while talking to undercover reporters, bringing a crushing end to his dream job after one match and 67 days in charge.

headline.print_headline: England Boss Allardyce Sacked After Newspaper Sting
headline.main: England Boss Allardyce Sacked After Newspaper Sting

snippet: Sam Allardyce was sacked as England manager on Tuesday having behaved "inappropriately" when seeking a lucrative sideline role while talking to undercover reporters, bringing a crushing end to his dream job after one match and 67 days in charge....
